subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Clint Bowyer won the Sprint Cup race Sunday, but he and his team were fined and docked 150 points for violations involving the setup of his car.
snippet: Clint Bowyer won the Sprint Cup race Sunday, but he and his team were fined and docked 150 points for violations involving the setup of his car.
